    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentRound

        public Round getCurrentRound()

      • isCurrentRoundInSecondPhase

        public boolean isCurrentRoundInSecondPhase()

      • startNextRound

        public void startNextRound(Table table)
                    throws RoundTrackNoMoreRoundsException
        Increments currentRoundId and calls initNewRound after that.
        Throws:
        RoundTrackNoMoreRoundsException - if this is called more than NUMBER_OF_ROUNDS times. This means that more than NUMBER_OF_ROUNDS rounds are trying to be played.

      • setRolledDiceLeftForCurrentRound

        public void setRolledDiceLeftForCurrentRound(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> rolledDiceLeft)
        Set the dice left in the current round's rolledDiceLeft
        Throws:
        RoundTrackTooManyDiceForCurrentPlayers - if rolledDiceLeft parameter' size is bigger than (players.size()*2 + 1)

      • getRound

        public Round getRound(int x)

      • isLastRound

        public boolean isLastRound()

      • swapDieInRound

        public int swapDieInRound(int dieIdToRemove,
                          int roundIdForDieIdToRemove,
                          int dieIdToAdd)
                   throws RoundHasNotBeenInitializedYetException,
                          DieNotPresentException
        Method needed for tool card n.5 where the player swaps a die between round track and draft pool
        Parameters:
        dieIdToRemove - die id to remove from round track
        dieIdToAdd - die id to add to round track
        Throws:
        DieNotPresentException - if dieIdToRemove is not present in any of round's rolledDiceLeft.
        RoundHasNotBeenInitializedYetException

      • checkColorIsPresentInRoundTrack

        public void checkColorIsPresentInRoundTrack(DieColor color)
                                     throws DieNotPresentException
        this method checks every round passed to see there is a die left behind with the color as the param color. If it finds one, it returns immediately. If it doesn't found one, it throw the DieNotPresentException
        Parameters:
        color - die color that needs to be in the round track
        Throws:
        DieNotPresentException - if the color is not present in any of the dice left of any rounds
